resource.chars:
Military Department 
No 350
Extract from the Minutes of Consultation 
25 January 1844.
Read the following letter 
From the Superintendent 
Magnetic Observatory at 
Madras
Here enter 10th January 1844.
The Most Noble the Governor 
in Council Observed that Lieutenant Ludlow,
Superintendent of Magnetic Observatory 
at Madras appears to have used his best 
exertions to attain the object of his journey 
to the Southward 
His Lordship in Council 
directs
